name: tonight-downtown-nashville-photowalk
title: Tonight: Downtown Nashville Photowalk
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
We have a lot of talented photographers in our happy little Nashvillest family, and we can’t imagine what kinds of creativity would surface if they all got together to collaborate. Tonight we’ll have a chance to find out. Some of Nashville’s photographers are gathering to do a summer photowalk – not only a great excuse to get out and get snapping, but a good opportunity to match a face to those Flickr photos.

Organizing the photowalk is our loyal reader, commenter, and photo contributor crashmattb. Meet up between 7pm-7:30pm TONIGHT at the parking lot between LP Field and the Shelby Street Bridge, and be sure to bring your cameras. Don’t forget to add your photos to the Nashvillest Flickr pool!

Photo by macintheus.
